idea-plugin.name: Dummy Text Generator
idea-plugin.description:
The plugin adds a dummy text generator button to the main toolbar
Randomly generated dummy text can than be inserted with a click, or replace a selection of text.
The plugin configuration allows to choose from several genres:
  • Fake Latin
  • Medical Drama
  • Pirate Lingo
  • Science Fiction
  • Esoteric Wisdom

When replacing a selection of text, the generated dummy text is of approximately the same length.
When the replaced text selection consists fully of lower-cased or capital letters or begins with a captial letter, that previous casing is maintained. Furthermore, the presence or absence of a trailing punctuation mark of a replaced text selection is being maintained.

Please note: This plugin is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.

The icons used in this plugin are based on the Fugue iconset (http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/)
